co.cask.cdap.api.dataset

Interface DatasetAdmin

  • All Superinterfaces:
    AutoCloseable, Closeable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    CompositeDatasetAdmin, RemoteDatasetAdmin

    @Beta
public interface DatasetAdmin
extends Closeable
    Defines the minimum administrative operations a dataset should support. There are no strong strict requirements on what is expected from each operation. Every dataset implementation figures out what is the best for itself. NOTE: even though seems to be not required, the list of common operations helps to bring better structure to dataset administration design and better guide the design of new datasets.
